attributes.action: Mrs Marjorie Bahhaj and Mrs Mandy el Khayat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like our rights has endogenous British citizens to be recognised in allowing our non EU husbands here in the UK to be with us, that our love be the foremost decider not economic situation.  We, our families and forefathers have been taxpayers to the UK and feel we have a right to bring our loved ones to our motherland without hinderance. We need our health & well being acknowledge as it pains without our husbands. We see immigrants to this land in similar or worse situations being given the right for their spouses to join them and thus feel we have not a future that is fair on us!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Individual cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
